title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 January 2017 - XWiki
content:
<boubou> has quit  
01:26 <boubou-> has joined #xwiki

09:09 <raphael29\_> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <ImRG> Anyone can provide me an example of wildfly configuration for xwiki ?  
09:25 <ImRG> I've a functionnal datasource & xadasource to a brand new postgresql database, but I don't see how to tell xwiki to use it  
09:28 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <mflorea\_> has joined #xwiki

11:12 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
11:36 <ImRG> ... Anyone alive around here except for xwikibot ? ...  
11:41 <Enygma`> ImRG: Of course :)  
11:42 <ImRG> I'm looking for help setting up xwiki.war on a wildfly 10 with postgresql datasource setup  
11:42 <ImRG> my datasource's fine, but I don't know how to tell xwiki to use it  
12:00 <Enygma`> ImRG: have you checked out http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationWAR#HUsingaDataSource ?  
12:01 <vmassol> hmm  
12:01 <vmassol> seems we have a "Test" user changing jira issues  
12:02 <vmassol> disabling the user and chcking what he did  
12:02 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks at the user mail  
12:02 <tmortagne> seems to be ludo playing  
12:02 <vmassol> :)  
12:02 <ImRG> Enygma`: doing so, but that's not exactly clear  
12:02 <vmassol> I doubt it, let me check with him  
12:04 <Enygma`> ImRG: a bit more details on the same topic here: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationHSQL#HOtheroptionalideas  
12:05 <Enygma`> did not really do it myself, maybe tmortagne could offer some more info  
12:05 <tmortagne> never tried databasource, sorry guys  
12:05 <tmortagne> datasource  
12:06 <vmassol> ok I've disabled it and reverted his changes  
12:07 <vmassol> (it = the Test user)  
12:24 <ImRG> kk  
12:24 <vmassol> has quit  
12:25 <ImRG> well gonna find some dev help, I guess I could c/c hibernate.cfg.xml somewhere like in wildfly/standalone/configuration and edit stuff but can't get it right
